document_data.name: Bards' Wisdom
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bards' Wisdom''' was a private library located in [[Calimport]].
document_data.Location: The business was located in [[Calimport/Quill Ward#Nasim Sabban|Yaraf Drudach of Nasim Sabban]] within [[Calimport/Quill Ward|Quill Ward]].
document_data.Structure: The Bards' Wisdom was a well-built, two-story building.
document_data.Services: The library housed a collection of books on topics of interest to [[bard]]s, such as travel, legends from other countries, epic songs, ''etc.'' It also served as a consortium of sages.
document_data.Inhabitants: The business was owned and operated by [[Kamal el Kitaeb]], who was also a [[druzir]] within the city.
